entities.name: dore
entities.description: Dore is mentioned as a person who shrieked in response to the situation.

entities.name: minister
entities.description: The Minister is mentioned as someone who has seen to the current situation. (Note: The text does not specify which minister)

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who had never seen Professor McGonagall lose control like this.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as someone who lost control and was trembling with fury.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as a person who spoke in a low voice to the group.

entities.name: mr. fudge
entities.description: Mr. Fudge is mentioned as someone who seemed to feel his personal safety was in question when told about the Death Eater.

entities.name: barty crouch
entities.description: Barty Crouch is mentioned as a person whose office was visited by Mr. Fudge and a dementor.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone who would not agree to allow dementors inside the castle.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall and Dumbledore disagreed on allowing dementors inside the castle.
Mr. Fudge visited Barty Crouch's office with a dementor.
